name: Petzl Caritool Tool Carrier  & Ice Screw Racking Clip
categories: Caritool Tool Carrier& Ice Screw Racking Cli
description: A handy gizmo that clips onto your harness waistbelt to hold ice screws and pitons. The top profile allows you to park screws to get to the right size.Toothed clip on the inside keeps it stable.Designed for carrying gear up to 10kg.Note: This clip is not a load-bearing device. It is NOT for climbing or bearing dynamic loads.
